mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (writer, contents, score1, score2, score3, score4, star_score, total_score, start_time, end_time, img_url, dulle_seq) VALUES (#{writer}, #{contents}, #{score1}, #{score2}, #{score3}, #{score4}, #{starScore}, #{totalScore}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{imgUrl}, #{dulleSeq});
mapper.select: SELECT seq, writer, contents, score1, score2, score3, score4, star_score as starScore, total_score as totalScore, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%h:%i%p') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%h:%i%p') as endTime, img_url as imgUrl, reg_date as regDate, dulle_seq as dulleSeq FROM community ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT seq, writer, contents, score1, score2, score3, score4, total_score as totalScore, star_score as starScore, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%h:%i%p') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%h:%i%p') as endTime, img_url as imgUrl, reg_date as regDate, dulle_seq as dulleSeq FROM community WHERE seq = #{seq}

SELECT seq, writer, contents, score1, score2, score3, score4, total_score as totalScore, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%h:%i%p') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%h:%i%p') as endTime, img_url as imgUrl, reg_date as regDate, dulle_seq as dulleSeq FROM community WHERE dulle_seq = #{dulleSeq} ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT IFNULL(AVG(total_score),0) FROM community WHERE dulle_seq =#{dulleSeq};
